example.text: Free speech is free speech and expressing free speech is actually opposite of the " banning " that is being alleged .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1 & 2. Based on verb entry ban.01, which maps to forbid-67. No framenet entry for the noun banning.

example.text: The banning of women from coffeehouses was not universal, but does appear to have been common in Europe.
